channel.title: andover on R. Miles McCain
channel.description: Recent content in andover on R. Miles McCain

item.title: Chinese Censorship
item.description: In this independent research project, Jeffrey Shen and I created CensorScout and the Weibo Censorship Dashboard, two pilot applications that make several steps toward increased transparency into censorship on Weibo and provide valuable—albeit limited—information regarding the state of Chinese Internet censorship. Published paper for open access on SSRN, made daily top-tens in several sections and top 10% of authors by downloads in the year following. Completed as part of Digital Propaganda & Censorship, an Independent Project at Phillips Academy under the mentorship of John Palfrey, Michael Barker, and Malgorzata Stergios.

item.title: Russian Disinformation
item.description: In this independent research project, Jeffrey Shen and I used machine learning and statistics to better understand the Russian disinformation campaign in the 2016 election. We released three blog posts, launched a Twitter bot, an open API, and deployed an interactive machine learning model. Published paper for open access on SSRN, made daily top-tens in several sections. Completed as part of Digital Propaganda & Censorship, an Independent Project at Phillips Academy under the mentorship of John Palfrey, Michael Barker, and Malgorzata Stergios.
